data.text:
[[File:|link=]]

Episode 18 is an episode in the Yo-Kai Watch anime series.

Summary[]

The Yo-Kai Kyuubi arrives in Sakura New Town to steal women's hearts through charm, and sets his sights on stealing Fumi's heart next, but cannot seem to succeed. When Keita's mother goes out and asks him to stay in for the postman, Keita's act of defying her request sends him into the Oni Time dimension where children are punished for not listening to their parents. Komasan's new ideas seem to be stolen by a rival company, leaving the president of Dandai suspicious of who is behind things.

Episode Structure[]
